description:
This package contains Virtual COM Port and D2XX drivers for FTDI devices

Virtual COM port (VCP) drivers cause the USB device to appear as an additional COM port available to the PC.  Application software can access the USB device in the same way as it would access a standard COM port.

D2XX drivers allow direct access to the USB device through a DLL.  Application software can access the USB device through a series of DLL function calls.
summary: This package contains Virtual COM Port and D2XX drivers for FTDI devices
author: Future Technology Devices International Ltd.
